Perform intradermal puncture.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary supplies for the intradermal puncture.
Perform intradermal puncture.subject: The nurse
Perform intradermal puncture.tools: sterile needle, syringe, alcohol swabs, gloves

Perform intradermal puncture.sentence: The nurse prepares the patient's skin by cleaning the area with an alcohol swab.
Perform intradermal puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform intradermal puncture.sentence: The nurse puts on sterile gloves to maintain a clean environment during the procedure.
Perform intradermal puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform intradermal puncture.sentence: The nurse inserts the needle into the dermis at a 10 to 15-degree angle to perform the puncture.
Perform intradermal puncture.subject: The nurse

Perform intradermal puncture.sentence: The nurse observes the puncture site for any immediate reactions after the injection.
Perform intradermal puncture.subject: The nurse
